author: Jessica Snouwaert
title: Watch people in cities around the world cheer from their windows and rooftops at the same time to thank healthcare workers and first responders
description: Every day, people are cheering and clapping in cities around the world to show appreciation and solidarity with front-line workers fighting the pandemic, such as nurses, doctors, and first responders. Cities are coordinating designated times to come together …
content:
Cities around the world are coming together daily to show appreciation for healthcare workers and first-responders by cheering and making noise from rooftops, balconies, and windows.
People in major cities such as Los Angeles and London coordinated designate… [+1046 chars]
